name: Molecule Factory
description:
Create factories that make specific molecules. The theme was "What if" and we made this game because we thought "What if molecules were made in factories", and because the puzzle genre fits the theme pretty well.

README:

Group:

Sebastian (Programming and art)

Mathias (Programming and sound)

Noah (Helped making some of the art)

Goal:

The goal to combine the different particles to create a molecule. You can see which molecule to create in the top right of a level.

Controls:

Select blocks in the toolbar at the top of the screen

Left click to place blocks

Right click to delete blocks

scroll to rotate or flip blocks
